name: Blue Card
effect: While you have a Tamer in play, you may use this card without meeting its color requirements.[Main] Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. You may digivolve 1 of your Digimon into 1 non-white Digimon card among them without paying its memory cost. If you don't, add 1 Digimon card among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
security_effect: [Security] You may play 1 Tamer card from your hand without paying its memory cost.
